headers.subject: [tosdr:2061] Your account and data may be deleted if inactive for 270 days

html:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and "other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough Microsoft.com has a different ToS).


The Microsoft branded services require that you sign into your Microsoft account periodically, at a minimum every 270 days, to keep the Microsoft branded services portion of the services active, unless provided otherwise in an offer for a paid portion of the services. If you fail to sign in during this period, we may cancel your access to the Microsoft branded services. If the Microsoft branded services are canceled due to your failure to sign in, your data may be permanently deleted from our servers.

 

From <http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Your account and data may be deleted if inactive for 270 days
text:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, 
profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo 
Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and 
"other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough 
Microsoft.com has a different ToS).

The Microsoft branded services require that you sign into your Microsoft account 
> periodically, at a minimum every 270 days, to keep the Microsoft branded 
> services portion of the services active, unless provided otherwise in an 
> offer for a paid portion of the services. If you fail to sign in during 
> this period, we may cancel your access to the Microsoft branded services. 
> If the Microsoft branded services are canceled due to your failure to 
> sign in, your data may be permanently deleted from our servers.
>
>  
>
> From <
> http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement
> > 
>

--
